definitions.text: a database containing an ordered array of items (names or topics)
the property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical
examples: the tower had a pronounced tilt
the ship developed a list to starboard
he walked with a heavy inclination to the right

definitions.text: give or make a list of; name individually; give the names of
examples: List the states west of the Mississippi
Am I listed in your register?

definitions.text: cause to lean to the side

examples: the wind made the vessel heel
We must number the names of the great mathematicians
